channel.title: Nicholas Adamou's Blog
channel.description: I am a full stack software engineer who is on a mission to make the world a better place through code.

item.title: How I Developed IBM's Direct File Input (DFI) Service for Global Ledger and Boosted NPS by 90 Points
item.description: Architecting the DFI Service for IBM's Global Ledger Interface, supporting 24k+ documents quarterly and managing 150k files during peak periods.

item.title: How I Developed IBM's Secrets Updater Tool and Saved Developers 99.99% of Their Time
item.description: Discover how the IBM Secrets Updater Tool drastically reduces the time and effort required to manage API credentials and tokens across multiple repositories in the CIO CI/CD pipeline.

item.title: How I Turbocharged Quality with End-to-End UI Testing in IBM's CI/CD Pipeline
item.description: Learn how the integration of End-to-End (E2E) UI testing into IBM's CI/CD pipeline has enhanced quality assurance, streamlined testing processes, and improved the overall development experience.
